name: MetalKabuterimon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your green Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 green Digimon for a memory cost of 2. [When Digivolving] If a card with [Hybrid] in its traits or [J.P. Shibayama] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less.
